trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents the SHIFT, ALT, and CTRL modifier keys on a keyboard.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxx XXXXX$ XXX$ xxx XXXX xxxxxxxx xxxx xx x xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The left or right ALT modifier key.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxx XXX xxxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The left or right SHIFT modifier key.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxx XXXXX xxxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The left or right CTRL modifier key.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxxxx XXXX xxxxxxxx xxx.$$x$$x
